## BlockPolledGivetyStore class

Ethers-based [GivetyStore](./lib-base.givetystore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BlockPolledGivetyStore extends GivetyStore<BlockPolledGivetyStoreExtraState> 
```
